movies.title: Violence des échanges en milieu tempéré
movies.plot: Philippe Seigner, a charming business school graduate from the French Pyrenees, starts his career in business consulting at the posh Paris seat of McGregor. His first serious task is a delicate one, an audit at the Janson food cans factory in the provinces, which is about to be taken over. As he soon realizes, this will mean sacking about 80 employees, as his boss Hugo Paradis knew from the start. However, his Paris girl friend reproaches him collaborating with ruthless capitalism, as if any of the downsizing could be stopped or mitigated by him bowing out. Nevertheless, as he gets to knew the threatened staff better he considers risking his career when his boss orders him to chose who should go. Meanwhile the factory staff starts realizing what's about to happening.
movies.simplePlot: Philippe Seigner, a charming business school graduate from the French Pyrenees, starts his career in business consulting at the posh Paris seat of McGregor. His first serious task is a ...

biography.bio: Jérémie Renier was born on January 6, 1981 in Brussels, Belgium. He is an actor and writer, known for Brotherhood of the Wolf (2001), In Bruges (2008) and L'enfant (2005).
biography.name: Jérémie Renier

biography.bio: Born in Paris in 1965, Laurent Lucas enrolled as a student of Charles Dullin and quickly became one of the most promising students at the Strasbourg National Theatre. He first appeared on the screen in 1996 in I Hate Love (1997) in which he delivered a riveting performance of a man who is HIV positive. Lucas next played in Pola X (1999) by Leos Carax, and then with Karin Viard, shot two outstanding films: La nouvelle Ève (1999) and Haut les coeurs! (1999), his performance for which won him a Cesar nomination for Best Aspiring Actor. In 2000, Lucas rose to notoriety with his role as a young father in _Harry un ami qui veut du bien (2000)_, and in 2003, appeared in three films presented at Cannes International Film Festival: Tiresia (2003), Qui a tué Bambi? (2003) and Va, petite! (2002). Most recently, Lucas' performances in Lemming (2005) by Dominik Moll and On the Trail of Igor Rizzi (2006) by Noël Mitrani have definitively placed him at the head of his generation of French actors.
biography.name: Laurent Lucas

biography.bio: Cylia Malki was born on November 8, 1976 in Paris, France. She is an actress, known for La Vie en Rose (2007), La moustache (2005) and La fille de Keltoum (2001).
biography.name: Cylia Malki

biography.bio: Olivier Perrier was born on September 15, 1940 in Hérisson, Allier, France. He is an actor and writer, known for Read My Lips (2001), Des hommes et des dieux (2010) and Les destinées (2000).
biography.name: Olivier Perrier

biography.bio: Samir Guesmi was born on October 7, 1967 in Paris, France. He is an actor and director, known for District B13 (2004), Tell No One (2006) and Camille redouble (2012).
biography.name: Samir Guesmi

biography.bio: Martine Chevallier is an actress, known for Tell No One (2006), Blame it on Fidel (2006) and Je vais bien, ne t'en fais pas (2006).
biography.name: Martine Chevallier

biography.bio: Pierre Cassignard was born on December 19, 1965 in Sainte-Foy-la-Grande, Gironde, France. He is an actor, known for Russian Dolls (2005), Seventh Heaven (1997) and Violence des échanges en milieu tempéré (2003).
biography.name: Pierre Cassignard

biography.bio: Nozha Khouadra is an actress, known for Honey and Ashes (1996), Two Brothers (2004) and Cheb (1991).
biography.name: Nozha Khouadra

biography.bio: Dani was born on November 24, 1944 in Perpignan, Pyrénées-Orientales, France as Danièle Graule. She is an actress, known for Day for Night (1973), Love on the Run (1979) and Avenue Montaigne (2006).
biography.name: Dani

biography.bio: Alain Rimoux is an actor, known for Cyrano de Bergerac (1990), District B13 (2004) and Mesrine Part 2: Public Enemy #1 (2008).
biography.name: Alain Rimoux

biography.bio: Mickaël Chirinian is an actor, known for France Boutique (2003), La chambre des officiers (2001) and Violence des échanges en milieu tempéré (2003).
biography.name: Mickaël Chirinian

biography.bio: Bernard Sens is an actor, known for Bob (le déplorable) (1995), Max et Bobo (1998) and Violence des échanges en milieu tempéré (2003).
biography.name: Bernard Sens

biography.bio: Valérie Kéruzoré is an actress, known for L'étudiante et Monsieur Henri (2015), Wild Innocence (2001) and Not Here to Be Loved (2005).
biography.name: Valérie Kéruzoré

biography.bio: David Migeot is known for his work on Violence des échanges en milieu tempéré (2003), Très bien, merci (2007) and Une preuve d'amour (2003).
biography.name: David Migeot

biography.bio: Florence Barillot is an actress, known for Violence des échanges en milieu tempéré (2003).
biography.name: Florence Barillot

categories.category: Most Promising Actor (Meilleur jeune espoir masculin)
